I did not live in the dorms, but I only heard good remarks about them.

Take advantage of every opportunity the school offers: the honors program, the leadership program, clubs, etc. Not only do these activities help you personally, it will also make you a better candidate.
MCC is one of the best community colleges. The teachers are wonderful and there are many opportunities for students.

textAfterTable: Janice from Brooklyn, NY 01/18/2012 Reviewer is A current student here. 3 out of 3 people found this review useful. 2 of 69 Categories Comments Campus Safety We have a great security team at the college and they are very strict in respect to the people they let into the collegebuildings. Clubs and Activities This college has a lot of clubs such as NABA, SIFE, a marketing, IT, minorityclub. It also has a lot of sporting activities where both male and female participate. Great for these types of students It caters to just about every need as they have a business school, an allied health care and a culinary school. Bang for the buck At Monroe there is a family atmosphere where everyone on the faculty looks out for the students and help them to adjust to the learning environs.
